Uses of Class
javax.sound.sampled.FloatControl.Type

  • Packages that use FloatControl.Type 
    Package Description
    javax.sound.sampled
    Provides interfaces and classes for capture, processing, and playback of sampled audio data.

    • Uses of FloatControl.Type in javax.sound.sampled

      Fields in javax.sound.sampled declared as FloatControl.Type 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.AUX_RETURN
      Represents a control for the auxiliary return gain on a line.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.AUX_SEND
      Represents a control for the auxiliary send gain on a line.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.BALANCE
      Represents a control for the relative balance of a stereo signal between two stereo speakers.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.MASTER_GAIN
      Represents a control for the overall gain on a line.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.PAN
      Represents a control for the relative pan (left-right positioning) of the signal.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.REVERB_RETURN
      Represents a control for the post-reverb gain on a line.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.REVERB_SEND
      Represents a control for the pre-reverb gain on a line.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.SAMPLE_RATE
      Represents a control that changes the sample rate of audio playback.
      static FloatControl.Type FloatControl.Type.VOLUME
      Represents a control for the volume on a line.
      Constructors in javax.sound.sampled with parameters of type FloatControl.Type 
      Constructor and Description
      FloatControl(FloatControl.Type type, float minimum, float maximum, float precision, int updatePeriod, float initialValue, String units)
      Constructs a new float control object with the given parameters.
      FloatControl(FloatControl.Type type, float minimum, float maximum, float precision, int updatePeriod, float initialValue, String units, String minLabel, String midLabel, String maxLabel)
      Constructs a new float control object with the given parameters
